title: Future of Copyright Anthology
description:
It is our great pleasure to announce the winner of the first edition of the Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Future of CopyrightÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ contest held by the Modern Poland Foundation. Our jury Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Prof. Michael Geist, Piotr Czerski and JarosÃ…â€šaw Lipszyc Ã¢â‚¬â€œ awarded the main prize to Aymeric Mansoux, author of Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Morphology of copyright taleÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.

Moreover, the jury decided to grant an honorable mention to Togi, author of the work Ã¢â‚¬Å¾GiveÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. Congratulations!

If you would like to read 10 best works which made it to anthology, you can download it for free Ã¢â‚¬â€œ you may choose PDF, MOBI and EPUB version. All works are available under CC BY-SA license. List of all works send for the contest is available on the contest webpage.

We would like to thank you for your crowdfunding support and a high standard of the submitted works. We were pleasantly surprised by the interest shown in the competition, and we have decided to hold its second edition next year. We hope that with your help it will be even more successful and the collected works will provide a strong voice in the debate on the future of copyright law and system.
